backend/main.mo: Defines service and booking types with add, fetch, and booking request operations stored in in‑memory maps.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for core frontend files including pages, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for home, services, details, booking, and user bookings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with header navigation, auth actions, mobile menu, and children rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch services, service details, create bookings, and load user bookings via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind root styles defining healthcare‑themed color palette and dark‑mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Booking page with form validation, Internet Identity login flow, and booking request submission for a selected service.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page with hero section, feature highlights, and navigation to services and user bookings.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookings.tsx: Displays user bookings after Internet Identity login, showing booking cards, statuses, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetails.tsx: Loads and displays details for a single service with coverage, inclusions, and a button to start booking.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Lists all services with search and locality filter, showing cards and navigation to service details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, existing features, and pending feature requests for the Chennai-focused healthcare app.
